  • Class
    Description
    BaseActivity
    BaseActivity class provides a common behavior for all activities in the application..
    BaseMoodListFragment
    BaseMoodListFragment is an abstract fragment that displays a list of moods and an optional map view for visualizing mood locations.
    BaseUserListFragment
    A base fragment for displaying a list of users with search functionality.
    CommentListAdapter
    A custom ArrayAdapter for displaying Comment objects in a ListView.
    CommentListFragment
    A DialogFragment that displays and manages comments for a specific mood event.
    FollowersFragment
    It displays a list of followers and provides functionality to remove them.
    FollowingFragment
    A fragment that displays a list of users the current user is following, with functionality to unfollow them.
    HintDropdownAdapter
    This class implements a custom array adapter that disables and grays out the first item of a dropdown in order for it to be a hint.
    HintDropdownEnumInterface
    Interface for enumerations that provide a display name for dropdown menus.
    HintDropdownItemSelectedListener
    A custom listener for handling item selections in dropdown (Spinner) menus.
    LoginFragment
    A simple Fragment subclass for login.
    LoginSignupActivity
    Handles user authentication flow by managing the login and signup fragments.
    LoginSignupFragment
    A simple Fragment subclass for LoginSignup screen.
    LoginSignupFragment.onButtonClickListener
     
    MainActivity
    The main activity that serves as the entry point for the application after login.
    MentionedMoodsFragment
    The MentionedMoodsFragment class extends the BaseMoodListFragment but shows the list of Moods where the user is mentioned in.
    MoodFilterFragment
    A dialog fragment for filtering mood events by time, emotion, trigger text, and location.
    MoodFollowingFragment
    A simple Fragment subclass.
    MoodFormFragment
    A DialogFragment subclass that implements form for adding and editing moods Use the MoodFormFragment.newInstance(com.example.cmput301_team_project.model.Mood) factory method to create an instance of this fragment.
    MoodHistoryFragment
    A simple Fragment subclass for user mood history screen.
    MoodListAdapter
    MoodListAdapter is a custom ArrayAdapter used to display a list of Mood objects in a ListView.
    PeopleFragment
    A fragment that displays a list of people in the application.
    RequestListAdapter
    Adapter class for managing a list of follow requests.
    RequestsFragment
    A simple Fragment subclass.
    SignupFragment
    A simple Fragment subclass for signup.
    UserFragment
    A simple Fragment subclass.
    UserListAdapter
    Adapter class for displaying a list of users with an associated action button.
    UserPagerAdapter
    Adapter class for managing fragments in the ViewPager2 component.
    ViewProfileFragment
    A DialogFragment that displays the user's profile with their name, username, follower count, following count, and most recent mood emoji.
